page.title: 07The People of Brickhill
page.content: Out of the 791 adults and children who took part in the survey, 379 were born in Bedford and were mainly the children. Families have moved into Brickhill from the following regions:- {East Anglia - 26%; Scotland - 3% {Ireland - 2%; Sth.England - 25% {Midlands - 8%; West Country- 4% {Nth.England - 19%; Wales - 5% {From various countries abroad - 8% } Only 56 adults anticipate that they will leave the area in the next few years for reasons of employment or study. 75% of the adults work locally. People travel to work in the following ways:- {By car - 60%; By 'bus - 7% {By motor-cycle - 6%; By train - 4% {By bicycle - 11%; On foot -10% {(2% either worked at home or travelled {by lorry or van)
